backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing plant entries with CRUD operations, ID generation, and name-sorted retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request for adding a soil-type filter to the plant entry list UI with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering header, plant entry list, footer, and global toaster with background pattern.
frontend/src/components/plant-entries/Pl: Card UI showing a plant entryâ€™s main details including planting date, germination status, light hours, and soil type.
Detail dialog for viewing, editing, and deleting a plant entry with germination info and confirmation dialogs.
Form component for creating or editing a plant entry with validation and mutation handling.
Displays a list of plant entries with soil-type filtering, loading and error states, and controls for viewing or adding entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and loading identities from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on plant entries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables using OKLCH earth-tone color tokens and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Contains helpers for converting between backend Time values and date strings, formatting dates, and computing day differences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and new feature requests for a seed-tracking app. Includes schema versioning, project notes, and detailed feature definitions.
